description:
guest: @AmaneKanata !
Holotalk is a live talkshow with the purpose of interviewing and live translating (mainly) Japanese Hololive talents to bring as much wholesome knowledge to oversea viewers as possible! Brought to you by your host, Takanashi Kiara.
ホロトークは英語圏向けのインタビュートークショーです。目的は生通訳しながら主に日本のタレントを海外の人たちに詳しく知ってもらう事です。ホストの小鳥遊キアラの提供で送りいたします
HOLOTALK MERCH available until 26th of DECEMBER!
EN: https://shop.hololivepro.com/en/products/takanashikiara_holotalkan2nd
JP: https://shop.hololivepro.com/products/takanashikiara_holotalkan2nd
Geekjack: https://shop.geekjack.net/products/takanashi-kiaras-holotalk-2nd-anniversary-celebration-merch-complete-set

[Viewer Rules]
Thank you for watching my stream!
To help everyone enjoy the stream more, please follow these rules:
1.Be nice to other viewers. Don’t spam or troll 
2.If you see spam or trolling, don’t respond. Just block, report, and ignore those comments.
3.Talk about the stream, but please don’t bring up unrelated topics or have personal conversations.
4.Don’t bring up other streamers or streams unless I mention them.
5.Similarly, don’t talk about me or my stream in other streamers’ chat.
6.Chatting before the stream starts is fine as long as it's not completely unrelated to Takanashi Kiara.
7. Backseating is welcome in most of my streams unless I say so. No spoilers!




＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝
